definition: the exam area/the district where an exam takes place
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Couch stopped when he was down to 3.7 liters of water.
sentences.chinese: 考区用完了三点七公升的水，就停止旅程。

sentences.english: The journey was Couch's third balloon flight.
sentences.chinese: 这是考区的第三次气球飞行。

definition: exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
to enter oneself for an examination
Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan/exam board
to add material to an exam/supplementary exam
Putonghua Proficiency Test, an official test of spoken fluency in Standard Chinese for native speakers of Chinese languages, developed in the PRC in 1994
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 hua4 Shui3 ping2 Ce4 shi4

definition: horizontal line (in a fraction)/minimum passing score
